metadata.title: Exploring SwiftUI App: Oh My Flag

inlineContent.text: Explore the SwiftUI App using Swift Playgrounds on iPad or in Xcode. In this walkthrough, you’ll learn the composition of Oh My Flag app. Enjoy it!

sections.title: Exploring SwiftUI App: Oh My Flag

doc://MyLibrary/tutorials/MyLibrary/Tabb.title: Create a new project and add GalleryView

abstract.text: Run the preview and tap to select the tabs at the bottom of the screen: Gallery, Quiz, and Drawing.

abstract.text: Explore the SwiftUI App using Swift Playgrounds on iPad or in Xcode. In this walkthrough, you’ll learn the composition of Oh My Flag app. Enjoy it!

slothcreator-intro.png.alt: An arrow pointing from the GalleryView framework icon to the Xcode app project icon.

chapter1-slothcreatorEssentials.png.alt: A wireframe of an app interface that has an outline of a sloth and four buttons below the sloth. The buttons display the following symbols, from left to right: snowflake, fire, wind, and lightning
